2015.context: Block, Inc. is a financial technology and digital payments company focused on Square merchant services, Cash App, and Bitcoin through Spiral. Square went public. Point-of-sale hardware and software for SMBs.

competitors.notes: Traditional payment terminals competing in SMB

competitors.notes: European mobile POS later acquired by PayPal

2020.context: Block, Inc. is a financial technology and digital payments company focused on Square merchant services, Cash App, and Bitcoin through Spiral. Cash App growth explosion. Pandemic accelerated digital payments.

2025.context: Block, Inc. is a financial technology and digital payments company focused on Square merchant services, Cash App, and Bitcoin through Spiral. Ecosystem connecting Square sellers with Cash App consumers. AI for merchants.

mentionedBy.name: Toast
mentionedBy.notes: Toast's biggest self-identified competitor with 25.56% market share in POS systems. Square for Restaurants offers general-purpose POS solutions that work well for small cafes, food trucks, and quick-service restaurants. Offers free plan with essential features, making it attractive for new businesses. Square competes across both retail and restaurant segments.
